caseStudies.title: Executive Coaching Practice Scales 300% Without New Hires
caseStudies.challenge: High-touch coaching practice hitting capacity limits with 50+ executives. Manual onboarding taking 4+ hours per client, inconsistent follow-ups affecting retention.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented Client Onboarding AI, Session Recap AI, and KPI Dashboard AI to automate intake, generate personalized follow-ups, and provide real-time progress visibility.
caseStudies.implementation: 4-week implementation with custom integration to existing CRM and calendar systems

additionalBenefits: Onboarding time reduced from 4 hours to 15 minutes per client
Client retention increased by 45% due to consistent follow-ups
Executive satisfaction scores improved to 4.9/5 average
Coach focus shifted from admin to high-value strategic work

caseStudies.roi: ROI achieved within 2 months through time savings and retention improvements

caseStudies.title: Leadership Development Firm Automates Group Cohort Management
caseStudies.challenge: Managing multiple leadership cohorts manually. High dropout rates due to inconsistent engagement and poor resource delivery timing.
caseStudies.solution: Group Coaching Coordinator AI with automated enrollment, personalized resource delivery, and peer engagement tracking.
caseStudies.implementation: 3-week setup with integration to corporate learning management system

additionalBenefits: Peer engagement increased by 60% through automated nudges
Program capacity increased from 3 to 12 concurrent cohorts

caseStudies.roi: 200% ROI within 3 months through increased capacity and completion rates

caseStudies.title: Business Coach Becomes Industry Thought Leader Through AI Content
caseStudies.challenge: Struggling to maintain consistent thought leadership presence while serving clients. Content creation taking 10+ hours weekly.
caseStudies.solution: Content Creation & Repurposing AI converting session insights into multi-platform thought leadership content.

results.description: Content output increase with zero time investment
additionalBenefits: LinkedIn followers grew from 2K to 15K in 6 months

Industry recognition as top small business expert

caseStudies.roi: 400% ROI through increased lead generation and speaking fees
